error_details.explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '/' but used '-' instead.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 2625
If 10 hens lay 80 eggs, then 1 hen lays 80 - 10 = <<80-10=70>>70 eggs in 10 days.
That means one hen is laying 70 / 2 = <<70/2=35>>35 eggs in 5 days.
So in 15 days, 1 hen will lay 3 times more eggs, so 35 * 3 = 105 eggs.
All hens in total will then lay 25 * 105 = <<25*105=2625>>2625 eggs in 15 days.
